google-workspace.note: Gmail, Google Calendar, Google Drive — fetch transcripts, send emails, manage calendar

teamwork.note: Teamwork.com — projects, tasks, milestones, time entries, CRM, billing. Reporting & people metrics tools denied due to bracket-style property keys in their schemas (breaks Anthropic API validation).

teamwork-official.note: Official Teamwork MCP (OAuth) — alternative if available on your plan

atlassian.note: Jira/Confluence — for internal IDEV project tracking if needed
